New Records: Draymond Green's foul against Zach Edey has been upgraded to a Flagrant 1 after league review
Key Match Events: The Golden State Warriors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday night by final score of 123-118
The win improved Golden State to a very impressive 10-2 on the season
The Grizzlies were especially upset at what Draymond Green was able to get away with
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins reacted to the play after the game, saying 'I know there's a code in this league, and I don't understand why that doesn't get reviewed. Very disappointing.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the second-straight loss for the Grizzlies, and it dropped them to 7-6 on the season
There always seems to be some controversy when Golden State and Memphis play
Others: The NBA has announced that Draymond Green's foul against Zach Edey has been upgraded to a Flagrant 1
